_comment: Variable values specific to macOS 12 Monterey; `apfs` is passed directly into the startosinstall command - it must be either YES or NO.
template_os below is for 10.14, darwin20 should be used for catalina when it becomes available in the vSphere API
boot_command: <enter><wait10><wait10><leftCtrlOn><f2><leftCtrlOff><right><wait><right><wait><right><wait><right><wait><down><wait><down><wait><down><wait><down><wait> <wait5>diskutil eraseDisk APFS 'Macintosh HD' /dev/disk0<enter><wait10>until '/Install macOS Monterey.app/Contents/Resources/startosinstall' --agreetolicense --volume '/Volumes/Macintosh HD'; do echo 'trying again...';
